entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, York Factory
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 28.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness after midnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 28. Wind chill minus 38 this evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 03 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of light snow. High minus 17.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Periods of light snow beginning in the morning. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High minus 17. Wind chill minus 36 in the morning and minus 27 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 03 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 22. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow in the evening and after midnight then partly cloudy. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the evening. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 25 in the evening and minus 32 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 03 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 17.
